This length of yew was polished in a lacquer made from the mingled, cooled, and refined breath of gold and silver dragon.

Shortbow 18m Two-Handed

Darkfire Shortbow is one of the Shortbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Darkfire Shortbow is a very useful bow that provides the user with resistance to fire and ice, it also can cast the spell Haste.
